EmailTemplate.name: Lead Quick LLC Auto Response
EmailTemplate.subject: Next steps for your business
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for choosing LegalZoom.
Congratulations on taking an important step in forming your new business. We’re excited you’ve chosen us to help.
What happens next?
A LegalZoom agent will give you a call to complete your business application, personally guiding you through the remaining information needed to form your new business.
In the meantime, we’ve prepared a Business Starter Roadmap with 8 essential things for many new business owners to consider.
Download Your Roadmap
http://www.legalzoom.com/resources/downloads/LegalZoom_Business_Starter_Roadmap.pdf
Get your business off to a good start
Have questions? We're here to help. (866) 385-5028 Mon-Fri 5am to 8pm PT Weekends 7am to 4pm PT LegalZoom provides access to independent attorneys and self-help services at your specific direction. We are not a law firm or a substitute for an attorney or law firm. Prices, features, terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. LegalZoom is located at 9900 Spectrum Drive, Austin, TX 78717.
This email was sent to: {!Lead.Company}
Please add services@emails.legalzoom.com to your address book.
© LegalZoom.com, Inc. All rights reserved.
